Classes¶

class intertext.classes.Actor(**attr)¶

Create an Actor:

>>> a = intertext.Actor(name='Foucault, Michel')
class intertext.classes.Text(**attr)¶

Create a Text:

>>> t = intertext.Text(title=u"L'Archéologie du savoir", date=u'1969')

Functions¶

intertext.functions.co_occurrences(edgelist, focus=u'target')¶

returns a defaultdict, which maps each co_occurrence (key) to a set of connectors (value)
